attributes.comment:
While I understand that to process any paperwork takes time, labor and money,
the recently proposed increases in filing fees for I-600, N-565, N-600 and
Biometric Services is disturbing. Adoption is expensive enough already, and it is
unconscionable to raise fees by up to 66% for adoption-related petitions. What
this makes me think is that there is a desire to dissuade families from
international adoption simply by making it more costly to do so.

Please keep in mind the fact that families are already spending tens of thousands
of dollars on this process; and we are not wealthy families--we simply want to give
homes to deserving children, and these petty fees raise more barriers in an
already difficult process.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Barnabas Abrams
